example.eg: After all these years of medical school, I can't wait to actually start treating patients.
example.egtrans: 读了这么些年的医学院，我简直等不及要真正开始照顾病人了。

example.eg: My last name looks German, but actually, it's Dutch.
example.egtrans: 我的姓看起来像德国的，但实际上是荷兰的。

example.eg: The dirtiest restaurant in town actually serves the best food.
example.egtrans: 镇上最脏的餐馆竟然味道最好。
